relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
I dunno Cliff from security guy is werido, guys!
Nice view! I can see the tappan zee bridge everyday I woke up! Hey, Nyack rocks!
Hang out, go and watch movies on Palisades Mall, and study to build the time machine!
Food? Ew, it stinks! But hey, we can hang out and do something for fun!
I don't mind stayin' in dorm but policy is terrible! Hey, i found that anyone who doesn't go to the meeting get pay $250.00 fines & Mike Cush doesn't allow RAs to give cellaphones!

Very good but Stephen Bennett and James Danaher are very bad! Hey, Stephen just teaches and never cares anyone! Danaher just curses like a crazy man! But guess what? Professor Linda Warren rocks, baby!
Hey, guys! Get to know professors, classes, and majors in advance!
Hey, Nyack College rocks! I wish its institute should offer more courses on our majors during the summer and every school semester.
pageTitle: Nyack College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {103943=Personally, I do not like this school and I will not be attending in the fall of 2014. It's too small and it is not enough to do on campus. Plus, freshmen have curfew (1 a.m), 129298=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 104724=The food for the first two weeks is amazing. Then after that you just dread it! There's no menu so you won't know whats for dinner until you get there. I'm saying it was amazing the first two weeks because I was not here spring semester 2013. You will get sick of the food very quickly. It's the same stuff all the time. The food on the weekend veeeerrrrryyyyyy bad. I don't go to the cafe on the weekends because it is so disappointing. Invest in a refrigerator!}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I love Nyack so much! I transferred here from Messiah College. This school really fit my needs. It was just far away enough for me to be independent, but it was close enough for me to go home when I needed to go home! Am learning a lot I am not just learning a lot academically, but spiritually as well! Nyack has taught me how to be independent in my faith. I have learned how to think like an adult and apply my knowledge to my faith, and vice versa! Login to rate or flag the reviews Lauren from Dublin, PA 05/04/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 3 of 33 Categories Comments What to do for fun Every weekend there is some type of fun going on!
